Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards

Class CornerCountObjective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.Objective
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.CountObjective
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.model.classes.cards.CornerCountObjective
public class CornerCountObjective extends CountObjective
Model implementation of a specific type of Condition/Objective, that requires to count the number of Corner the current Card is covering on the nearby Cards in the Play Area.

  • Constructor Details

    • CornerCountObjective

      public CornerCountObjective(int points, int number, Card card, String description)
      Constructor Method for CornerCountObjective
      Parameters:
      points - : the number of points the Condition gives every time it's satisfied
      number - : the number of Corners that need to be counted to satisfy the Condition once.
      card - : the Card that contains this Condition, used to determine who are the nearby Cards to check.
      description - : a String containing the Description of the Objective, displayed in the GUI.

      protected int check(ArrayList<Card> playArea)
      Method inherited from Objective. Checks if the Condition has been met and how many times.
      Specified by:
      check in class Objective
      Parameters:
      playArea - : the ArrayList of Cards containing all the Cards the Player has played.
      Returns:
      the number of times the Condition has been satisfied (0 if it hasn't been).
